programme.title: George Gallup (1901-1984)
programme.short_synopsis: The achievements of George Gallup, inventor of the Gallup poll of public opinion.
programme.medium_synopsis: The achievements of George Gallup, inventor of the Gallup poll, a method of measuring public opinion, and responsible for revolutionary change in the democratic process.
